It extracts fitted spline function by xspline_approx_gam.
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

It extracts fitted spline function by xspline_approx_gam.

It extracts fitted spline function by xspline_approx_gam.

get_xs_call(xs_env, pred_var_name)

Arguments

fitted_gam

Fitted gam model approximating data.
...

Other arguments passed to mgcv::predict.gam method.

Value

Function of one variable.

Examples

set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(20, 5, 5)
z <- rnorm(20, 0, 10)
y <- - sin(x) + z ^ 3 + rnorm(20, 0, 0.1)
data <- data.frame(x, y, z)
blackbox <- randomForest::randomForest(y ~ ., data)

z_var_response <- pdp::partial(blackbox, "z")
#> Error in get_training_data.default(object): The training data could not be extracted from object. Please supply the raw training data using the `train` argument in the call to `partial`.
z_var_response_approx <- approx_with_spline(z_var_response, "yhat", "z")
#> Error in approx_with_spline(z_var_response, "yhat", "z"): could not find function "approx_with_spline"
z_env <- list(
  blackbox_response_obj = z_var_response,
  blackbox_response_approx = z_var_response_approx
)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'z_var_response' not found
z_var_spline <- get_xs_call(z_env, "z")
#> Error in get_xs_call(z_env, "z"): could not find function "get_xs_call"
z_range <- attr(z_var_spline, "variable_range")
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'z_var_spline' not found
z_axis <- seq(z_range[1], z_range[2], length.out = 50)
#> Error in seq(z_range[1], z_range[2], length.out = 50): object 'z_range' not found

plot(z, y)
lines(z_var_response)
#> Error in lines(z_var_response): object 'z_var_response' not found
lines(z_axis, z_var_spline(z_axis))
#> Error in lines(z_axis, z_var_spline(z_axis)): object 'z_axis' not found

x_var_response <- pdp::partial(blackbox, "x")
#> Error in get_training_data.default(object): The training data could not be extracted from object. Please supply the raw training data using the `train` argument in the call to `partial`.
x_var_response_approx <- approx_with_spline(x_var_response, "yhat", "x")
#> Error in approx_with_spline(x_var_response, "yhat", "x"): could not find function "approx_with_spline"
x_env <- list(
  blackbox_response_obj = x_var_response,
  blackbox_response_approx = x_var_response_approx
)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x_var_response' not found
x_var_spline <- get_xs_call(x_env, "x")
#> Error in get_xs_call(x_env, "x"): could not find function "get_xs_call"
x_range <- attr(x_var_spline, "variable_range")
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'x_var_spline' not found
x_axis <- seq(x_range[1], x_range[2], length.out = 50)
#> Error in seq(x_range[1], x_range[2], length.out = 50): object 'x_range' not found

plot(x, y)
lines(x_var_response)
#> Error in lines(x_var_response): object 'x_var_response' not found
lines(x_axis, x_var_spline(x_axis))
#> Error in lines(x_axis, x_var_spline(x_axis)): object 'x_axis' not found
